name: dantzigpricing
brief:
HiGHS QP Dantzig pricing rule

Classic Dantzig pricing: select constraint with largest dual infeasibility.

algorithms.name: Dantzig Pricing for QP Active Set
algorithms.math:
Select constraint to drop: p = argmax_i |λ_i| where λ_i violates sign.
      For constraint active at lower bound: drop if λ_i < 0.
      For constraint active at upper bound: drop if λ_i > 0.
      Simplest pivot rule but may cycle without perturbation.
algorithms.complexity: O(|active set|) per pricing. No weight maintenance.
